column1: Little Goat Diner////We got here at 11 am on a Saturday and put down our name for four people.  We were told that the wait was an hour and ten minutes if we were okay with cafeteria seating
column2: and an additional ten minutes if we wanted our own booth.  We asked for a booth.  We ended up waiting an hour
column3: and an additional half an hour for our food after we ordered.  Had to run outside and feed the parking meter
column4: because we only put two hours in.
